detail_desc: Short dress in cotton poplin with a square neckline and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, a gathered seam under the bust, smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with pockets in the side seams. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.

Short dress in cotton poplin with a square neckline and horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with covered elastication, a gathered seam under the bust, smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with pockets in the side seams. Concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline, short sleeves and slits in the sides.

Straight-cut shirt in soft flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless, flared top in jacquard-weave viscose with elastication and a small frill trim around the top and wide, bow-topped shoulder straps.
Sleeveless, flared top in jacquard-weave viscose with elastication and a small frill trim around the top and wide, bow-topped shoulder straps.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in woven fabric containing glittery threads. High waist with covered elastication. Unlined.
Trousers in soft, washed cotton denim with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and hems. Fake pockets. The cotton content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and fly with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets, pleats at the top, and tapered legs with creases.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjama shorts in soft, ribbed jersey with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems with short slits.
Padded soft velour toy in the shape of a princess weasel with a decorative tulle bow on her head. Removable dress in tulle and organza with a glittery print. Length approx. 25 cm.
Straight-cut blouse in imitation leather with an opening and button at the back of the neck and darts under the bust. Big puff sleeves with covered elastication and a small frill trim at the hems.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Playsuit in lightweight, patterned cotton twill with a sweetheart neckline and buttons at the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist with pleats at the front, front pockets and short, wide legs.

Playsuit in lightweight, patterned cotton twill with a sweetheart neckline and buttons at the top. Short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, a seam at the waist with pleats at the front, front pockets and short, wide legs.

Hi-top trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with scallop-edged hook and loop fasteners at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Trainers in fabric with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a small loop at the back. Patterned soles with a good grip.
Trainers in fabric with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a small loop at the back. Patterned soles with a good grip.
Trainers in fabric with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a small loop at the back. Patterned soles with a good grip.
Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed cotton jersey. Adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.

Blouse with long puff sleeves and gathered elastication to create a gently draped effect at the cuffs. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a seam with wide smocking at the hem. Unlined.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back and a print motif. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Cropped, bralette-style top in soft imitation leather with a square neckline front and back, concealed zip at the back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Lined.

Blouse with long puff sleeves that have narrow elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking around the forearms. Square neckline with gathers at the front for a gently draped effect over the bust and smocking at the back. Lined at the front.

Blouse with long puff sleeves that have narrow elastication over the shoulders and wide smocking around the forearms. Square neckline with gathers at the front for a gently draped effect over the bust and smocking at the back. Lined at the front.
Headband knitted in a soft wool blend with a twisted detail at the front.
Headband knitted in a soft wool blend with a twisted detail at the front.
High-waisted, short skirt in chiffon with a concealed zip and button at one side, elastication at the back of the waist and pleats front and back to create soft draping. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Sports top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and a straight hem.
Headband in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a knot at the front.
Headband in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a knot at the front.
Loafers in imitation patent leather with chunky, patterned soles. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave.
Lined wellingtons with a loop at the back and chunky soles. Heel 2.2 cm.
Lined wellingtons with a loop at the back and chunky soles. Heel 2.2 cm.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave. Deep V-neck front and back with smocking and three rows of flounces, and a visible zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a flared peplum that has a slit at the back.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave. Deep V-neck front and back with smocking and three rows of flounces, and a visible zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a flared peplum that has a slit at the back.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Long sleeved top with a print motif and appliqués in the shape of cat ears on the front. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and mesh bat wings with a glittery print under the arms. Skinny-fit, glittery leggings with easy pull-on, soft, covered elastication at the waist.

Wide, off-the-shoulder top in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Wide, pleated flounce at the top with concealed elastication and voluminous, balloon sleeves with narrow, internal elastication at the cuffs.
Gloves in a soft, fine-knit, warming cashmere blend with a long, ribbed shaft.
Trainers in leather with suede details, a padded top edge and tongue and lacing. Leather linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Trainers with scuba, mesh and imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, lacing and a tongue with a fabric appliqué at the front, and a loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made from recycled polyester, and chunky, fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neck, text print motif on the front and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Sturdy sandals with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles for a good grip.
Sturdy sandals with a hook and loop fastening, heel caps that are lightly padded at the top, and a small loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and patterned soles for a good grip.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, discreet side pockets and wide legs.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top, a zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, discreet side pockets and wide legs.
Short shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a visible fly with press-studs, and patch pockets front and back.
Short shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a visible fly with press-studs, and patch pockets front and back.
Short shorts in cotton twill. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a visible fly with press-studs, and patch pockets front and back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck.

Body in lace and mesh with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Non-wired, V-neck body in lace with cap sleeves and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
